title: The Gathering
description: After betraying the only man he ever loved, Hadrian waits for death amidst the ruins of a sorcerous battle. Wracked with guilt, he agrees to join a mage-led mission to bring his evil father to justice. But when Caled, the handsome mercenary he betrayed, insists on joining the mission too, Hadrian discovers that Caled's need for revenge will set the two men on a twisted path of desire and hatred.Words: 52283 (approximate)
author: Tricia Owens
